# PDF Platform
# https://domain.com

## About
PDF Platform is a free, privacy-first online PDF toolkit. We offer tools to merge, compress, split, edit, and convert PDF files - all processed in your browser.

## Key Features
- PDF Merge: Combine multiple PDFs
- PDF Compress: Reduce file size
- PDF Split: Separate pages
- PDF to JPG: Convert to images
- JPG to PDF: Create PDFs from images
- PDF Edit: Modify content
- PDF Sign: Add signatures
- 100% Free & Secure
- No file upload (client-side processing)
- No registration required

## Popular Tools

### PDF Merge
URL: /pdf-birlestir
Description: Combine multiple PDF files into one. Supports password-protected PDFs, unlimited files, drag-and-drop interface.
Use case: Merging contracts, reports, invoices

### PDF Compress
URL: /pdf-sikistir
Description: Reduce PDF file size by up to 70% without quality loss. Three compression levels available.
Use case: Email attachments, storage optimization

### PDF Split
URL: /pdf-bol
Description: Extract pages or split PDF into multiple files. Range selection, every page, or custom split.
Use case: Extracting specific chapters, sharing portions

### PDF to JPG
URL: /pdf-den-jpg
Description: Convert PDF pages to high-quality JPG images. Select specific pages or convert all.
Use case: Creating thumbnails, sharing on social media

### JPG to PDF
URL: /jpg-den-pdf
Description: Convert images (JPG, PNG, WebP) to PDF. Batch conversion, custom page size.
Use case: Scanning documents, creating catalogs

## Technical Details
- Client-side processing (privacy-first)
- No file upload to servers
- Uses pdf-lib and PDF.js
- PWA support (offline capable)
- Mobile responsive
- WCAG 2.1 AA accessible

## Privacy & Security
- Files never leave your device
- No tracking or analytics
- No data collection
- Open source libraries
- HTTPS only
- No third-party services
